I'm not sure why so many reviews for this shirt are so negative. It's a fine looking shirt for the price, fits comfortably and looks great as well. The 100% cotton material is a little thick as other reviewers have mentioned, but not overly so. However, this means that the shirt will likely last longer than other similar shirts with thinner material. I washed it normally, but did not place it in the dryer and did not experience any shrinkage.  If you don't want any shrinkage to occur, I recommend that you air dry the shirt to avoid this from potentially happening. It's generally good advice to avoid placing cotton or linen clothing in the dryer at high temperatures to avoid any potential shrinkage, unless the tag clearly says "pre-shrunk cotton" on it.

评论概述: Be aware that size is not accurate to standard men USA measurements
评论详情: I like the look and feel of this shirt. I usually order Xlarge or large in shirts. My chess size is 41. I ordered this shirt X-large in hopes that it would fit, so I can order more colors. The shirt has a size listed as 3XL. I don't know if this size is the equivalent of XL USA, so I'm confused. The size chart listed for these shirts is also confusing, according to the chart a 41 size chest would be a small. I have not used small in ages. If the size was correct I would give it a 5 stars. I will see if I can get some information on what size I can order and report on the review.

评论概述: Good but yikes!  Could the size be any more off???
评论详情: This shirt was "supposed" to be a baggy overshirt for my bean pole of a daughter.  I bought a Men's small and my daughter is about as large as a flea in a fur coat (maybe a size 0?).Well...it fits her like a normal shirt...for a gal that wears a size 0.  Are men normally this tiny?  Did the Marlboro Man go anorexic?  I didn't expect Men's clothing to be waifish in size.  Maybe I was shopping in the Hobbit  section and just didn't notice.That aside, its really quite a lovely shirt!
